name: Nextbot Graveyard
description:
Munci has lost their children in the graveyard and needs your help finding them.

Use your portable radio and careful listening skills to track them all down. But be warned, as dangerous nextbots will be lurking on other radio channels and are ready to rise from the grave...

Complete all of Munci's stages to collect all 5 gifts!

Note (A): This game's primary mechanic centers around audio cues and careful listening. Unfortunately, those who are hard-of-hearing will not be able to enjoy this experience.

Note (B): This game uses high-definition graphics that require a decent PC to run. A non-gaming laptop will likely not be powerful enough. I am currently attempting to create a lightweight version, but it's a work in progress!

PLEASE report all bugs by emailing me:support@derndeff.com The Story of How I Made This Game:
